remarks: Division operation in a ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
dvrval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
dvrval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
dvrval.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
dvrval.i $e |- I = ( invr ` R ) $.
dvrval.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
dvrfval $p |- ./ = ( x e. B , y e. U |-> ( x .x. ( I ` y ) ) ) $.
$d .x. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
